segments.text: How do I know if there is a vacancy in a company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Easy . View the home page of the company , and see if they need staff . Many websites offer two-way service , such as job-hunting and talent hunting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 21st Talent Website , 51 Job , and Zhaopin.com are most popular .
segments.speaker: S2
